settings.title: Work in the best workplace possible
settings.subtitle: The Right to Race – Follow Dominic as he overcomes personal and societal challenges on his inspiring journey to the Olympics, showcasing his determination and passion for athletics.

settings.title: Taylor Moore's Journey
settings.text: Moore won the 2023 Valspar Championship and continues to climb in the PGA Tour rankings. Known for his determination and skill, Moore’s career is steadily progressing as he earns recognition in the golf world.

settings.title: Zac Blair's Journey
settings.text: Blair’s highlights include a runner-up finish at the 2023 Travelers Championship and a career-high ranking of 92nd on the PGA Tour.

settings.title: Brian Harman's Journey
settings.text: Harman, a left-handed player, also finished as a runner-up at the 2017 U.S. Open and recently won the 2025 Valero Texas Open.

settings.title: Full Time Store Sales Associate
settings.text:
Sales Associate – Men's Apparel

Join our team as a Sales Associate specializing in men's apparel. You'll assist customers in selecting from our range of polos, t-shirts, and sweaters, ensuring they find the perfect fit and style. Your role will involve maintaining product displays, processing transactions, and providing exceptional customer service to enhance the shopping experience.
settings.text1:
Sales Associate – Women's & Juniors Apparel

As a Sales Associate focusing on women's and juniors' apparel, you'll guide customers through our collection of dresses, tops, and bottoms. Your responsibilities include styling assistance, inventory management, and creating a welcoming atmosphere that encourages repeat visits.
settings.text2:
Sales Associate – Customer Experience Specialist

We are seeking a passionate and customer-focused Sales Associate to join our team. In this role, you will be the first point of contact for customers, providing personalized assistance and product recommendations. Your responsibilities will include greeting customers, understanding their needs, and guiding them to suitable products. You will also manage transactions, maintain store displays, and ensure a welcoming store environment. The ideal candidate will have excellent communication skills, a friendly demeanor, and a genuine interest in helping customers find the perfect products.

settings.title: Retail Administrative Manager
settings.text:
Retail Operations Coordinator

The Retail Operations Coordinator will oversee the day-to-day administrative tasks of our retail operations. Responsibilities include scheduling staff shifts, coordinating with vendors, managing inventory records, and ensuring compliance with company policies. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail are essential for this role.
settings.text1:
Retail Compliance Officer

As a Retail Compliance Officer, you will ensure that all retail operations adhere to legal and regulatory standards. Your duties will include conducting regular audits, reviewing operational procedures, and implementing corrective actions when necessary. A thorough understanding of retail laws and regulations is required for this position.
settings.text2:
Retail Administrative Executive

The Retail Administrative Executive will provide comprehensive administrative support to the retail management team. Responsibilities include preparing reports, handling correspondence, maintaining filing systems, and assisting in the development of operational procedures. Excellent communication and organizational skills are required for this role.

settings.title: Retail IT Manager
settings.text:
IT Systems Administrator

We are seeking an IT Systems Administrator to manage and maintain our organization's technology infrastructure. This role involves overseeing computer systems, networks, and data security, ensuring seamless operations across all retail locations. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in IT systems management and a proactive approach to troubleshooting and problem-solving.
settings.text1:
IT Support Specialist

Join our team as an IT Support Specialist, providing technical assistance to staff and ensuring the smooth operation of all IT systems. Responsibilities include diagnosing hardware and software issues, assisting with system installations, and offering training to employees on new technologies. A customer-focused mindset and strong communication skills are essential for this role.
settings.text2:
IT Project Manager

We are looking for an IT Project Manager to lead and coordinate technology initiatives within our retail operations. This role involves planning, executing, and overseeing IT projects, ensuring they are completed on time and within budget. The ideal candidate will have experience in project management and a deep understanding of retail technology needs.
